name: Visiting Bridgerton Tavern
description:
You play as a Hero, weary and hungry after many weeks on the road - travelling since their last quest. Stopping at the Tavern in the town of Bridgerton, you quickly begin to sense that something is not quite right...


A short piece of interactive fiction written for a university assignment.  Feedback is welcome, but be aware that this isn't necessarily representative of the writing ability of those involved, as we were given strict restrictions for our games by the university.
